ygData.msgSnippet: Cliffjumper looked around, a bit suprised at how he took charge. All right then, Transform, and Roll Out. he said, with hope in his voice. Cliffjumper jumped

Cliffjumper looked around, a bit suprised at how he took charge. "All
right then, Transform, and Roll Out." he said, with hope in his voice.
Cliffjumper jumped up, and all his legs and arms tucked in as he landed
on the ground in car mode. Beachcomber turned around, and lay down on
his stomach, as his legs folded back, and his arms in.

Firedrill wakled up to Redhot. "Do you need a ride, or do you have
enough energy?" he asked.
